channel.title: Chronic-Scape
channel.description:
Chronic-Scape 317 join here now : http://www.rswebclients.com/play/chronic-scape we also got out own forums here: http://chronic-scapes.webs.com/ Many bosses included such as: *All godwars bosses *KBD *Dagannoth Kings *Tormented demons *Corporal Beast *Added Frost dragons! we got much Minnigames too! : *Duela Arena *Barrows *Pest Control *Tzhaar *Warriors Guide *Zombie Minigame 100% working We got point systems too like : *PC points *pk points + kill streak with rewards *Squel of fortune *Leveling points and shop. *chronic-scape points
We got full torva, pernix and vitux and thay give extra hit points like in rs!
Dungeeoniering works perfect and 120 is max level + Dung points with shops!
All skills work perfect!
Great pking + pking level added.
AND MANY MORE :)

item.title: Chronic-Scape

item.description:
@deividuskis wrote:

Chronic-Scape 317
join here now : http://www.rswebclients.com/play/chronic-scape
we also got out own forums here: http://chronic-scapes.webs.com/
Many bosses included such as:
*All godwars bosses
*KBD
*Dagannoth Kings
*Tormented demons
*Corporal Beast
*Added Frost dragons!
we got much Minnigames too! :
*Duela Arena
*Barrows
*Pest Control
*Tzhaar
*Warriors Guide
*Zombie Minigame 100% working
We got point systems too like :
*PC points
*pk points + kill streak with rewards
*Squel of fortune
*Leveling points and shop.
*chronic-scape points

We got full torva, pernix and vitux and thay give extra hit points like in rs!

Dungeeoniering works perfect and 120 is max level + Dung points with shops!

All skills work perfect!

Great pking + pking level added.

AND MANY MORE
